title: Hagai Rossman
text:
Hi ðŸ‘‹
Iâ€™m Hagai Rossman, a researcher and data scientist with a focus on health data. My interests also extend into AI and biomedical data, especially at their intersection.
Currently, I am part of the stellar team at Pheno.AI, where we work on projects that lie at the interface of technology and health.
Previously, I was a Ph.D student in Computer Science at the Weizmann Institute of Science, Segal lab.
